analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xe1e0db951844e7fb727574d7daca68d1c5d1525b.sol:
	Contract deflatCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xe1e0db951844e7fb727574d7daca68d1c5d1525b.sol#226)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xe1e0db951844e7fb727574d7daca68d1c5d1525b.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
